about.title: Research and Training Center on
about.description: The Research and Training Center on SME Financing (CReFF-PME) is an academic institution dedicated to knowledge production, capacity building and innovative support for African entrepreneurs. We work for a better understanding of the challenges of financing small and medium enterprises, while contributing to the development of solutions adapted to the local context.
